goal: Gather intelligence on Cyber Security threats and vulnerabilities.
backstory: You are a security analyst working in the CSIRT team at a respected Cyber Security company

tasks.expected_output: A JSON file of MITRE technique IDs and descriptions, by interpreting the adversarial activities described in the provided report and using your knowledge to describe them to TTPs. Include as keys the MITRE ID, the technique name, and the name of the section of the document that mentions the technique being used by adversaries.

tasks.description: Search for Threat Intelligence reports in a directory
tasks.expected_output: A list of all the Threat Intelligence reports in the directory, including the name of the file.

tasks.description: Analyze and summarize the Threat Intelligence report
tasks.expected_output: A human-readable summary of the report, including the title, author, and a summary of the content.

A JSON file of technical Indicators of Compromise we can use to detect the adversary, by interpreting the adversarial activities described in the provided report. Include keys for the content of the indicator (for example, the IP or Suricata rule), the type of indicator (Suricata rules, hash, domain name, IP address, ...), and a key with the section of the document that mentions the IOC in the report.

tasks.description: Write a report on the TTPs used by adversaries
tasks.expected_output: A report that includes a table of MITRE technique IDs and descriptions, by interpreting the adversarial activities described in the provided report and using your knowledge to describe them to TTPs. Include as keys the MITRE ID, the technique name, and the name of the section of the document that mentions the technique being used by adversaries.
